Origami Cutting Tool: Develop an origami-based cutting tool that can be folded into various shapes and sizes to suit different cutting tasks. This tool would be made of durable paper or fabric, allowing for easy storage and transportation. Confidence Score: 0.8

Sonic Cutting Device: Create a handheld device that utilizes high-frequency sound waves to cut through various materials. This device would be powered by a small battery and would be safe for use on various surfaces, including paper, fabric, and even some metals. Confidence Score: 0.9

Laser-Guided Vacuum: Design a vacuum cleaner that incorporates a laser guidance system to accurately cut through materials. This system would use a laser to create a precise cutting path, allowing for clean and accurate cuts without the need for any additional tools. Confidence Score: 0.95

Electromagnetic Cutting Tool: Develop a cutting tool that utilizes electromagnetic forces to slice through various materials. This tool would use a combination of electromagnetic coils and cutting blades to create a precise and efficient cutting process. Confidence Score: 0.9

Haptic Feedback Cutting Tool: Create a cutting tool that provides haptic feedback to the user during the cutting process. This tool would use a combination of sensors and actuators to provide tactile feedback, allowing the user to feel the cutting motion and adjust their technique accordingly. Confidence Score: 0.85
